price: Kitabın indirilmesi –ki onda şüphe yoktur- âlemlerin Rabbindendir.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi lā rayba fīhi min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
